weekly_top_story.headline: White House Launches 'TrumpRx' Program Linking Drug Discounts to Tariff Exemptions
weekly_top_story.summary: President Trump has launched a government-run drug purchasing platform (TrumpRx.gov) with a pricing deal with Pfizer that links lower drug costs to temporary tariff relief, signaling renewed pressure on the pharmaceutical industry to reduce prices.

stories.headline: Cancer Drug Made 20,000 Times More Potent In Breakthrough
stories.summary: Researchers from Northwestern University have restructured the common chemotherapy drug 5-fluorouracil (5FU) into a spherical nucleic acid nanostructure, making its cancer cell-killing abilities up to 20,000 times more effective while reducing toxicity.

stories.headline: Trump Administration Orders States to Review Medicaid Rolls for Undocumented Immigrants
stories.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services has directed state Medicaid agencies to review enrollee lists for undocumented immigrants, citing concerns that over $1 billion in federal funds were spent on ineligible individuals, though several states dispute the accuracy of the figures.
